fields.name: Skill Description
fields.value:
• Voodoo Dolls activate the <Destiny Bond> skill at the start of a battle
• The skill places a __curse__ on an enemy unit. If the target unit is of same or lower level as the cursing Voodoo Doll, the curse is 100% successful. If the target unit is of higher level, the curse rate is reduced (roughly 60% for one level difference).
• When a Voodoo Doll is injured, the cursed unit receives the same damage.
• A Voodoo Doll cannot curse a hero or another Voodoo Doll.
• If the cursed unit died before the cursing Voodoo Doll dies, the Voodoo Doll curses another unit.
• Magic Apprentice and Demon are immue to <Destiny Bond> while in flight
• In Honor Hunting, if a Voodoo Doll died, it deals __direct damage__ to the world boss (the boss’s defense is not factored).
• In army battles, if a Voodoo Doll died, it deals damage to the cursed unit (the cursed unit’s defense and any damage immunity are factored).

fields.name: Main Uses
fields.value: • Voodoo Dolls are essential in Honor Hunting due to their high attack power and skill.

footer.text: Use `{PREFIX}curse <troops name> [troops level] 'voodoo dolls' [voodoo's level]` to see the effect of a Voodoo Dolls unit on a targeted enemy unit.
